title: Comment on ``Describing Weyl Neutrinos by a Set of Maxwell-like Equations" by S. Bruce
abstract: Results of the work of S. Bruce [{\it Nuovo Cimento} {\bf 110}B (1995) 115] are compared with those of recent papers of D. V. Ahluwalia and myself, devoted to describing neutral particles of spin $j=1/2$ and $j=1$.
